segments.text: I observe the tranquil scene outside through the window, contrasting sharply with the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink looks serene, but her world is on the brink of a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands dangerously close to the edge of that unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel frustration bubbling inside me at her ignorance of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are at play, yet this play feels perilous and heavy with risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The expectation on the girl’s face tells me all I need to know about their intentions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s endearing and terrifying at the same time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but anticipate the moment when someone will slip on that puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water drips down the cabinet doors, a silent countdown to chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will learn from this moment, or just laugh it off later.
segments.speaker: PAR
